title: Community looking for players for scrims and teams

embed.description: Check out the Letalis Caelestis community on Discord - hang out with 74 other members and enjoy free voice and text chat.

body:
Hey guys,
Letalis Caelestis are looking for players of all roles to join a thriving community aimed at building 5v5 teams for practise games, flex queue, fortnightly in-house scrims & to compete in Iron 2 plat & Plat 2 Challenger tournaments (+ other tournaments) in the future. 

We are looking to fill our rosters with the following:

Team Cerberus - (Diamond+) : Toplane
Team Atlas - (Platinum+)  : Toplane, Middle, Support
Team Odin - (Gold+) : Toplane, AD Carry, Support,
Team Anubis - (Gold+) : All roles + Team Captain. 

If you are looking to captain & recruit players for a team look no further. 
Players are required to :
 - Have a working microphone (English speaking only) 
 - Be 16+ years of age
 - Take constructive criticism 
Any competitive experience is a + for being considered a spot on a roster, but it is in no means a requirement. 

We are also on the lookout for potential Coaching / Analyst staff who would like to be apart of the community to help improve our teams, what we are looking for is : 
 - experience coaching other teams (optional) 
 - looking to gain experience by coaching your own roster. 

If you are interested then feel free to join the discord (link provided above) or you can add me or the other head admin in-game:
Saiph / VuIpes (capital i for VuIpes)

Thanks for reading, we hope to have you with us!
{{sticker:sg-ezreal}}
